title: Summerfield
genre: Courtroom, Crime, Espionage & Thrillers/Detective and mystery films
abstract: Mystery and intrigue in this drama about a house called Summerfield.
description: When a newcomer arrives in a small, secluded town to discover that the former teacher has disappeared, he probes into the mystery and becomes more and more intrigued by the inhabitants of a forbidding house called Summerfield. Eventually, the secrets of Summerfield are revealed in a dramatic ending with a shock twist. Directed by Ken Hannam (director of 'Sunday Too Far Away') and starring, Nick Tate, Elizabeth Alexander and John Waters, 'Summerfield' was shot on location at Victoria's Phillip and Churchill Islands.
related_objects: Object; R0000900; [Summerfield : publicity kit]; Patricia Lovell, Ken Hannam; To be Catalogued
